languages.text: Атака по области наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем существам, оказавшимся в зоне ее действия. Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами дистанционного оружия и специальными {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g}.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Атака по области наносит {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} всем существам, оказавшимся в зоне ее действия. Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}дальнобойного оружия{/g} и специальными способностями разных классов.

Атака по области наносит {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} всем существам, оказавшимся в зоне ее действия. Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}дальнобойного оружия{/g} и специальными способностями разных классов.

languages.text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
languages.original_text: Атака по области наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем существам, оказавшимся в зоне ее действия. Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами дистанционного оружия и специальными {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An area attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee weapons{/g}, some {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}ranged weapons{/g}, and through using special abilities of different classes.

An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

languages.text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} fügt allen Kreaturen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, die sich in seinem Wirkungsbereich befinden. Solche Angriffe können mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffen, einigen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Waffen und durch Einsatz von Spezial-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} ausgeführt werden.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} für allen Kreaturen {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} zu, die sich in seinem ​​{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effektbereich{/g} befinden. Solche Angriffe können mit Nahkampfwaffen und mit manchen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} durchgeführt werden, ebenfalls durch Einsatz von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Spezialfähigkeiten{/g} verschiedener Klassen.

languages.text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à toute créature dans sa zone d'effet. Une telle attaque peut être lancée à l'aide d'armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} ou de certaines armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, et en utilisant des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} à toutes les créatures situées dans sa zone d'​​{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}. Une telle attaque peut être lancée à l'aide d'armes de mêlée ou de certaines armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, et en utilisant des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales de différentes classes.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}可以对目标区域内所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器、部分{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器，以及部分特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}都可以触发范围攻击。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}可以对目标区域内所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器、部分{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器，以及部分特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}都可以触发范围攻击。

languages.original_text: An area attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee weapons{/g}, some {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}ranged weapons{/g}, and through using special abilities of different classes.

languages.text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todas las criaturas en su área deefecto. Estos ataques pueden realizarse con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, algunas armas a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} y a través de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} concretas.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} a todas las criaturas en su área de​{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}. Estos ataques pueden realizarse con armas cuerpo a cuerpo, algunas armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} y a través de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} concretas de varias clases.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}はその効果対象範囲内の全ての生物に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このような攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接武器{/g}、一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器、そして特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}により可能。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}はその{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}対象範囲内の全てのクリーチャーに{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このような攻撃は近接武器、一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器、および異なるクラスの特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}により可能。

languages.text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! Note: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! Note: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
